website_summaries.verdict: An affordable yet powerful gas hedge trimmer that's easy to maneuver and is ideal for most consumers' needs.
pros: Dual 22-inch stainless steel blades can handle fairly thick branches
At around 11 pounds, it's easy for most consumers to use
cons: Some issues with the pull-start mechanism have been reported

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: Took out of box, Gas up and will not start. Called Poulan and I was giving two names of locations(25 miles away) That will service under warranty. Called both locations and was told they will not honor warranty service for Poulan being I bought online. Called Poulan back and was told they could do nothing for me and wanted to giving more locations to take it for service. Poulan's customer service is god awfull and will never buy any of there products again!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: dall08022

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed and will never buy a Poulan product again
customer_reviews.text: The second time I used this the pull cord went all the way out and would not rewind. Fifty dollar repair bill to fix this . I bought this brand because I expected years of reliable use. Very disappointed and will never buy a Poulan product again.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Machine started right up. Trimmed the hedge until it ...
customer_reviews.text: Machine started right up. Trimmed the hedge until it was stopped Recoil starter would not restart the devise. However Amazon replaced it with a few days. .
customer_reviews.author: Ted Morris

customer_reviews.title: I received the trimmer on Friday and used it on ...
customer_reviews.text: I received the trimmer on Friday and used it on Saturday and it performed well. I tried to start it on Sunday and a piece of plastic in the start pull start mechanism broke locking up the pull cord. I called their support and was told to take it to an authorized repair facility. There Was unable to talk to a tech and just left it with a clerk and was told I would be called with repair cost if the failure is not under warranty. This is hard to take with a machine that I only got 2 hours of use from.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Frustrated
customer_reviews.text: First time out of the box and to late to return, it will not stay running! I bought this in December for my husband for Christmas and he hasn’t been able to use until now...spring time! Tried calling Poulan and all I get is recorded message, won’t let me talk to anyone, very frustrated right now.
customer_reviews.author: K. Caswell

customer_reviews.title: Nice solid cutting machine
customer_reviews.text: I used this to clear a property I am buying of some pretty heavy shrubs. Picked up some ethanol-free gas, put in the oil, fired it up and went right to work. Cuts very nicely for shrubs up to 1" thick. I cut quite a number of larger shrubs and this machine went right through them. Saved me hours of work. As others have noted, the handle has some kind of cushioning that makes if move around a little, but I didn't notice after the first 5 minutes. Overall, a nice solid machine, a good value and a nice addition to my tool collection.
customer_reviews.author: David M. Klein

customer_reviews.title: Nice product for the money
customer_reviews.text: A very good solution for homeowner trimming. I replaced a commercial trimmer that finally quit. This model was less than 1/2 the cost of the trimmer I wanted to buy an Echo. For the money, this trimmer runs like a champ. Starts just fine, cuts great. My only observation is the weight. It is quite heavy. Not something you would want to use for hours on end, but for occasional use, its a great solution for $120 bucks
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap hedge trimmer
customer_reviews.text: Okay so after less than a year owning it the thing would not run unless it was held at full throttle. Which is normally a sign of fuel being left in for a long time and gumming up the carb. This was not the case. I work on small motors like this a lot and know better. Also it developed a fuel leak at the gas tank where the fuel line enters. I called the phone numbers listed as local repair shops for a warranty repair. None of them will work on this anymore because of problems from the factories and getting parts. I would not reccomend buying this trimmer after all of the hassle I am having.
customer_reviews.author: Treemonkey

customer_reviews.title: so far works great trimmed all my hedges just fine very light is ...
customer_reviews.text: so far works great trimmed all my hedges just fine very light is a little tough to start but doing its job juts fine defiantly for home use but hedge I timed was 60' long by 8' tall all 3 sides and top did fine will cut up to a good 1/2" diameter limb pretty easy
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Worst service ever ... do not buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: Got one but wouldn’t keep running. Amazon connected me to the seller. I was told to go to a shop fairly close to me for repair/carburetor adjustment, I was told by them that there were no adjustments .. huh ? So today I received the replacement.. would not idle but there is an idle adjustment and seems to run okay now. BUT I now need to repackage the first one and take it to UPS. So go to the shop with no fixes, repackage the first one and now go to UPS to ship it back. Worst thing I ever bought through Amazon
customer_reviews.author: F Offereins

customer_reviews.title: Great, Easy start
customer_reviews.text: Great,Easy start, comfortable to use, great value, I own a large lot of land and are always looking for great products, I own several Poulan products, they are dependable and last a life time Definetely a buy for home owner or commercial
customer_reviews.author: WARREN CHADWICK

customer_reviews.title: Works Great, A Couple Minor Annoyances
customer_reviews.text: I’m happy with the hedge trimmer. It works well, and cuts through small branches and leaves quickly and easily. A couple minor complaints: the handle seems flimsy, hopefully it won’t break prematurely. I think it’s due to the feature that you can rotate the handle 90 degrees sideways. Also the product arrived in the box with the choke sticker installed backwards. I was able to figure it out and remove and reinstall the sticker myself in the proper orientation after looking at photos in the owner’s manual. Other than those two minor annoyances, I am please with the hedge trimmer and recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Tom P.

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: I love this hedge trimmer. It is powerful and cuts through a lot. I have about 3 full hours on it and it runs like a champ. However it is somewhat heavy and it will give you a workout if it is being used overhead. My arms were sore the next day. Just follow the directions for startup and then go to work. I also think the price was very reasonable plus free shipping and no tax. It was a no brainer for me. However I did buy the extended warranty just in case I had problems down the road. This is perfect for home use, but I would look at other options for commercial or industrial use.
customer_reviews.author: A. Hill

customer_reviews.title: A Piece of Junk
customer_reviews.text: I bought this during the Winter due to a big discount being offered at that time. I just tried to use it for the first time and it keeps stalling out. Did some trouble shooting. Checked connections and adjusted the idle speed but nothing seems to work. It just keeps stalling out. I got what I paid for - a piece of junk. I'll go back to my electric hedge trimmer and eat this $115 loss. One of the few bad buys I've experienced on Amazon. You live and you learn.
customer_reviews.author: TWD

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend you save a bit more for a stihl
customer_reviews.text: Decent overall. Definitely recommend you save a bit more for a stihl
customer_reviews.author: E.D

customer_reviews.title: Good buy for handy people
customer_reviews.text: Okay purchase if you are handy. I owned a Poulan pro chainsaw that was garbage and I was having reservations buying this. The carbs on these are junk. I had to adjust mine out of the box. I would recommend you only run Trufuel through these as the carbs will gum up on gas. If you know small engines and are on a budget, this is perfect. It gets the job done as you probably wouldn’t be using it more than twice a year.
customer_reviews.author: scout001

customer_reviews.title: Real POS.
customer_reviews.text: Never again. This is my second one and both had the same hard starting problem. I’ve tried everything to resolve the issue, but to no avail. The first one that I owned developed a crack in the housing after one season. Thinking that this might be a one time fluke, I purchased this second one. After 30 minutes of farting around with this one, I believe it will also develop a crack in the housing....when I smack it with a splitting maul. No more Poulan Pro products for me.
customer_reviews.author: Reasonably Amused.

customer_reviews.title: Starts easily and runs until I stop it!
customer_reviews.text: Followed instructions and trimmer started almost on the first pull . Half choke and the trimmer started on the second pull . Worked flawlessly for two hours of trimming. Not to heavy and very maneuverable. Very good tool!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph D.

customer_reviews.title: Poulin pro pr2322
customer_reviews.text: Purchased from Amazon and used hedge trimmer 2 times. The third time i went to pull the rip cord and it stayed out. Took it to Amazon warranty shop, where it has been for 2 months. Can't seem to get an answer on what's taking so long to fix it? Also can't seem to get an answer to why rip cord and all plastics inside broke after a few pulls? Warranty store told me I should sell it and buy a different brand. UPDATE finally had the pull start replaced after waiting5 months at the repair center. Selling on offer-up. afraid to pull the cord even 1 time. Built very poorly.
customer_reviews.author: heidi chapman

customer_reviews.title: Adjustable Handle is Great!
customer_reviews.text: Overall this is a solid unit. The price that Amazon charges is just as swell. There are other brands out there that are not able to cut the 1" branches, this did not seem to have much issue. Use it to trim an orange tree, other bushes around the house. Does great on all
customer_reviews.author: Just Michael

customer_reviews.title: Awesome tool.
customer_reviews.text: This Poulan Pro PR2322 Hedge Trimmer is just great. I had to replace a gas hedge trimmer that I had used (and abused) for over ten years. I decided to buy this Poulan Pro, and I was very happy that I did. The long reach of the 22 inch blade is handy for everything from Cottoneaster to Hydrangea. It is well powered and never bogs down. I like the power and portability of the gas engine. I highly recommend this one if you need a trimmer.
customer_reviews.author: Calvin Tadema

customer_reviews.title: Crappy service
customer_reviews.text: Unable to get product support, has a two year warranty that's worthless if you can't get support when you need it. No promised follow up. Yea, I will never buy a Poulan product again and neither should you! And the old service company told me that they could not get parts or response from Poulan either.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Pollina

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: You read so many negative reviews on Poulan products. I got this out and followed the start up instructions very carefully. It cranked on the first pull. I ran it and was afraid to turn it off but I did. Once again it started on one pull and every other time that day which had to be a half dozen or more, one pull cranking.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Stanley

customer_reviews.title: Man's hedger
customer_reviews.text: Its asking me to rate the, "battery life", lol. Women use batteries, men (or bad ass women) use 2 stroke. This thing is a monster, kind of tricky to hold while starting but starts easy & stomps butt (vs the cord version). Kinda heavy so you need to switch hands every so often.
customer_reviews.author: R SCOT SMITH

customer_reviews.title: Poulan; never again.
customer_reviews.text: This is the last Poulan product I buy. I couldnt even get it to start. I'm not going to waste any time returning it and it sure isn't worth having repaired. I don't expect a lot when I buy cheap equipment but I feel I should've gotten a couple hours use from it. I should've known better.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT TOOL!
customer_reviews.text: We own an old Victorian Home that has been beautifully landscaped with MANY bushes and shrubs. However, I always hated spring and fall pruning as it would take forever (sometimes a whole weekend or more).... Not anymore! This Trimmer is a beast and we knocked out the trimming in a fraction of the time. LOVE IT! Very easy to use but can get a little heavy after a while if you are trimming alone. My husband and I stand on opposite sides of the bushes/shrubs and hand it back and forth to allow breaks. We love it and our landscaping looks fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: Taylor H.

customer_reviews.title: Bull shit
customer_reviews.text: Total disaster Used it twice for 10 and 20 minutes Want start leaks gas Another bs from amazon that was not reviewed.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Pszczola

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight but durable!
customer_reviews.text: I liked how this is a fairly lightweight trimmer for a gas powered one. I had borrowed my neighbors up until this point and I would be tired after about 15 minutes because it was so heavy! I trimmed for about an hour and a half with this one and it was MUCH easier. Also did not seem to emit as much exhaust! Happy customer
customer_reviews.author: Amy Griffith

customer_reviews.title: 76 year old male finds hedge trimming much easier with better results
customer_reviews.text: I have approximately 200 feet of five foot high privet hedge surrounding much of my front yard. i replaced a 16 inch craftsman trimmer with the 22 inch Poulan trimmer. The poulan 22 inch blade allows me to trim top of hedge about 24 inchs in one pass. It is much lighter and runs longer on a tank of gas than the craftsman. It started easily every time. The hedge received several compliments from neighbors on appearance. I am about to cut the hedge for the second time with I hope the same results as the first attempt.
customer_reviews.author: Donald baker

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Unit started up right out of the box. It eats throught branches and bushes with ease. Larger branches require some paitence for the unit to chew throw the branches. The twist handle is great. Perfect for sculpting bushes. I also used it on some trees that were rubbing on my house.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Pratt

customer_reviews.title: HEAVY
customer_reviews.text: If you need to use by extending arms, you better bulk-up first. Works well, but not as good as I had hoped on larger branches. More what I would expect from power of a good electric cutter. Expect much more from gas powered. Did I mention.....VERY heavy and awkward to use with extended arms.
customer_reviews.author: Builder+Bob

customer_reviews.title: Works well, easy to use but not light.
customer_reviews.text: Has plenty of power making quick work of hedges. My only complaint is the pivoting handle is not well built and if not positioned just right it locks out the throttle control, this became frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Cali

customer_reviews.title: Performed as expected worth the money !!
customer_reviews.text: Started up after a few pulls with proper priming and choke on a little heavy when trimming overhead brush but did my task beautifully with plenty of power. Nothing like gas power compared to battery operation just no comparison.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Mawson

customer_reviews.title: Hubby loves the trimmer
customer_reviews.text: My husband ia picky about his tools. We looked several places and he never found what he wanted. I pulled the trimmer up on Amazon and it was exa ctly what he had been shopping for. He has only been able to use it one time due to all tha rain.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Miller

customer_reviews.title: Good hedge trimmer for the price
customer_reviews.text: Good trimmer. Cuts stuff less than 3/4" pretty easily. Make sure you find the grease fitting and give it some lubrication or this trimmer won't last long. Very pleased with this purchase overall.
customer_reviews.author: A. Roark

customer_reviews.title: Used it twice and it won't run now.
customer_reviews.text: After only using the trimmer twice, it won't stay running. The shop we took it to says it needs a new carburetor. So we called the warranty people who gave us an address for a shop to fix it. We went there and they said they didn't do repairs on Poulan Pros. They gave us another shop's name. Took it there and they said the repair didn't fall under the warranty because it was fuel related!! Do not buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: Joanie Dobesh

customer_reviews.title: Well I've only used it once but ran great
customer_reviews.text: Hedger not too heavy and for me appeared to be well balanced. Review will be updated after several more uses if I observe any deficiencies or problems.
customer_reviews.author: Captain Jack

customer_reviews.title: Light weight and works amazing
customer_reviews.text: So nice to have a gas tool that starts on the first try each and every use! Well made, light and easy to use. Wish I had more hedges. Extremely pleased
customer_reviews.author: Sunny D Mom

customer_reviews.title: Gas tank leaks around grommet.
customer_reviews.text: On the fourth time using the trimmer it started leaking gas. Until i can find another grommet to go in the gas tank i can't use the trimmer. Cuts great . Easy to start.
customer_reviews.author: mf. b

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Good machine, easy starting, but wears me out, doubt it’s any worse than similar products. I also have a battery powered electric that I can operate with one arm. Can’t do that with gas powered, but gas powered handles heavier jobs with ease that the electric can’t. I got tired of renting gas powered, the trimmer will pay for itself after 5 or so uses.
customer_reviews.author: STANLEY R DELAIR

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: We bought this in November 2019 used maybe 3 times, developed a leak in the tank in May....it was too late to replace/return ...won't buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: has issues
customer_reviews.text: lots of power, the blade bends, the adjustable handle is unnecessary and results in a weak connection to the unit. good, it starts and has power, bad has all the quality construction of a well built toy anybody know if theres a replacement blade?
customer_reviews.author: mid

customer_reviews.title: awesome trimmer
customer_reviews.text: great deal. cuts clean through fairly large vegetation. more than adequate for the homeowner and it would probably hold up under daily professional use.
customer_reviews.author: HDJ

customer_reviews.title: GOOD BUY!!
customer_reviews.text: I shopped around before making this purchase and I am glad I did. I cranked it up right out of the box let it run at idle for a min to get the motor warmed up and they cut beautifully! I've put about 20 hours on the engine so far and it's still going strong. Great quality trimmers for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Clint M Spero

customer_reviews.title: Heavy but completes the job like a champ
customer_reviews.text: Thing started up right away and I have used it for several commercial jobs for my customers. It is heavy so better work out before hand. But it’s gas and can go go go all day.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: The trimmer did better than I expected It started very easily, and did not get jammed. I finished the job in a 1/3rd the time, if done by hand. It advertised up to one inch diameter limb cutting and it didn't slow down much even at that size. As with any of these, checking for twigs fowling the blades is important. I can recommend this trimmer.
customer_reviews.author: C Knox

customer_reviews.title: Excellent hedge trimmer
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy working with this cutter. It can cut thru 1/2 inch branches. I like it a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Kenwood A. Peet

customer_reviews.title: Great price and value
customer_reviews.text: Found this on Amazon. Beat price at lowes and home depot. Easy to use. Works great. No more extension cord or battery. Great power.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Soto

customer_reviews.title: Stalls
customer_reviews.text: The trimmer started easy while cold and cut well on full throttle. But each time the throttle was released the trimmer stalled and was difficult to start. The fuel tank was full and the engine hot. Seemed to be full starved.
customer_reviews.author: Big D

customer_reviews.title: Works like expected
customer_reviews.text: Put gas and oil in, pulled it a couple of times and it started up.. Did exactly what I needed out of it. Nothing special nothing not special.
customer_reviews.author: K. Turney

customer_reviews.title: It work okay. Not great
customer_reviews.text: It works decent. Can real be a pain sometimes but it gets the job done. I should have spent more and got a nicer one.
customer_reviews.author: Scherschligt

customer_reviews.title: Poor placement of priming bulb
customer_reviews.text: I use it to trim shrubs. The only complaint is about the location of the primer bulb. I have small fingers and I can barely work my finger or thumb in between the motor parts to get any leverage to pump the bulb. I can not immagin this tool was put in production with this obvious rediculous difficult placement. I woud not recommend anyone buy this for that reason.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it easy to start a does a great job.
customer_reviews.author: Cartier Carter

customer_reviews.title: Buy here and save over Lowes
customer_reviews.text: I like the power it has. Makes short work of any job. The tip is great for touching up and reaching in the back of those bushes. Starts easy and has finger tip throttle.
customer_reviews.author: Preston Cody

customer_reviews.title: Great For the Money
customer_reviews.text: Product started easily. Ran well. Used it for about 2 hrs when I got it. The weight of the machine makes it tiresome to use for prolonged periods. Stalled once. Handle feels flimsy. The rotating handle is nice but if the handle is not locked in place you can not squeeze the trigger. Great for the money. Saved a lot buying it on Amazon vice Lowes.
customer_reviews.author: Austin Young

customer_reviews.title: Works very well.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband to replace his electric one. This one works so much better and is more efficient in cutting hard to trim landscaping.
customer_reviews.author: Mags

customer_reviews.title: Easy on the wallet
customer_reviews.text: I liked the price for this unit. It runs well so far without any issues. The only thing i didn't like is the box it came in looked like it had been opened already. The clear tape was cut open before i had a chance to cut it.
customer_reviews.author: CoprToneNTVE

customer_reviews.title: Awesome trimmers
customer_reviews.text: I am really pleased with the power this trimmer has. It cuts through everything I’ve thrown at it. Easy to start and not heavy. Just the perfect trimmer.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick LeViere

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Trimmer
customer_reviews.text: The trimmer is easy to work with as an amateur! It cuts quick an clean. It worked so well that I felt like a professional artist.
customer_reviews.author: JayPeeR2

customer_reviews.title: A work horse....
customer_reviews.text: Terrific product upgraded a older model,huge difference...one thought the handle is such you can rotate it to get to tough spots,it feels a little spongie but does a great job!
customer_reviews.author: BoxsterSBob

customer_reviews.title: Trim those hedges!
customer_reviews.text: Love this trimmer! Started right up. Have about 2 hours or so on it no problem at all.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Grant

customer_reviews.title: Only limited use so far
customer_reviews.text: Only limited use so far but none of the problems mentioned by some others in their reviews. Hopefully they won't appear as time goes on. It works well and, as of now, I'm pleased.
customer_reviews.author: bmf

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Cuts great!! Starts every time. The swivel handle makes it convenient to trim in any direction.
customer_reviews.author: Roger

customer_reviews.title: Like butter
customer_reviews.text: Why did I waste all the time and effort in the past with electric trimmers. This cut right through bushes with ease.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Powerful machine and very sharp
customer_reviews.text: The hedge trimmer does a great job, it will run rings around my electric one.
customer_reviews.author: Dan D.

customer_reviews.title: Performs as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I have a large property with plenty of vegetation to trim and it does a great job.
customer_reviews.author: The Colonel

customer_reviews.title: Gas powered hedge trimmer
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised, easy start and cut my hedges, no problem. Don’t have to worry about cutting extension cord (not that I did).
customer_reviews.author: Richard W Bourne

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love it !!! It takes me more than 1 pull to start it, but it runs, and trims great !!! The swiveling handle makes a big difference on certain cutting. Beautiful !!! It will cut through 1" stuff, but not that good. But I had to try it. It is a hedge trimmer, not a chainsaw. Very happy with it !!!
customer_reviews.author: James Potter

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent value for the money. It’s a little flimsy, but for the price? I followed the instructions, it runs and cuts great. Starts on first or second pull.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn ArmstrongTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: EASY TO HANDLE AND EASY TO CRANK.....VERY SMOOTH RUNNING AND CUTTING.
customer_reviews.author: Rhett Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Great Trimmer
customer_reviews.text: Great hedge trimmer. Has some pretty large cutting capabilities. I would say up to 1.25 " Works great so far!
customer_reviews.author: WinU

customer_reviews.title: Good Trimmer but***
customer_reviews.text: Works very well. I wish carb had adjustment for high idle since I'm at 5000'. One problem with rotating handle. In the 3 o'clock position the throttle won't work. Otherwise I recommend this trimmer.
customer_reviews.author: DaveM

customer_reviews.title: Impressive
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome will do just as much as your top end products for a portion of the price very impressed
customer_reviews.author: Chad J.

customer_reviews.title: Quality product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! There rotating handle makes it more comfortable to use.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Harris

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Trimmer is awesome cuts very well easy start and cut pretty big diameter brush
customer_reviews.author: clifford miller

customer_reviews.title: Great job
customer_reviews.text: Not super easy to start but what 2 cycle is. Did a great job on my bushes. Gas pump bulb could be more accessible
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Totally Unreliable
customer_reviews.text: Shocking piece of junk! Had it for three weeks and it quit running and would only start sporadically. Made all the necessary adjustments and it still does not work. Runs fine one day, can’t even get started the next. I’ve done everything correctly, the machine is terrible.
customer_reviews.author: LCV

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: O. K. so far. Not as big or strong as my old professional one but much less expensive.
customer_reviews.author: D Ziemer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible customer service & warranry
customer_reviews.text: The unit leaked fuel out the choke opening & the warranty dept would not not guarantee repair or replace...very bad customer service, returned item & refund...will not buy or recommend a Poulan product.
customer_reviews.author: RoxieRoad

customer_reviews.title: Get what you pay for!!
customer_reviews.text: Good price but that’s about it!! Very hard to start and only runs with choke on!!! Heavy and exhaust blows right in your face!!
customer_reviews.author: Heath

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Decently priced! I am used to stihls equipment however as long as you use non ethanol gas this product will last a long time. I also bought a poulan pro back pack blower that I haven’t had a problem with in the two years of owning it. Due to the non ethanol gas of course. Really helps.
customer_reviews.author: Troy Buckley

customer_reviews.title: Trimmer
customer_reviews.text: Trimmer works perfectly and starts with no problem thank god no more extension cord
customer_reviews.author: henry j graham

customer_reviews.title: How easy was that!
customer_reviews.text: Light weight an easy too use. Out of the box gas an go too it.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Most helpful
customer_reviews.text: This tool is extremely helpful. I live on a Acer of land that is slopped. Much easier with the gas then trying to run extension cords all the way to the farthest corner. Make work much easier.
customer_reviews.author: kathy beeston

customer_reviews.title: Works well.
customer_reviews.text: I used the product once before Winter set in. So far I’m very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur Davis

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product works great
customer_reviews.text: Great value trimmer like the idle start button and swivel features
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: this is heavy piece of equipment
customer_reviews.text: I have used the trimmer to cut and shape boxwood's. It does not cut smoothly so you have to force the cuts. It does a reasonably good job. It starts easily. I have never had a gas trimmer before and am not sure how to compare this.
customer_reviews.author: john w.

customer_reviews.title: 1 issue but great buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: Trigger/accelerator binds up sometime and only goes 1/2 throttle!!! Machine tore through my hedges with NO problem tho!!! Easy to start and quick & easy swivel handle was a great idea!!!
customer_reviews.author: TPE

customer_reviews.title: It’s powerful
customer_reviews.text: This will cut just about any outside brush you have around your landscape.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: JUNK
customer_reviews.text: Hard to start, failed during 2nd attempt to trim bushes. Cheap plastic parts (trigger - rotating handle lock) poor seal at fuel line / fuel tank. Currently not able to keep running.
customer_reviews.author: JON STAVIN

customer_reviews.title: hedge trimmer
customer_reviews.text: can not run hard very long.shut down and have to wait a few minutes to cool off
customer_reviews.author: Larry Walker

customer_reviews.title: Poulan Pro 22-inch Gas Powered Trimmer
customer_reviews.text: Purchasing the trimmer was one of the best decisions I have ever made.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product starts every time and has proven to be indestructible highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Thad noethe

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to use!!
customer_reviews.text: This was a FANTASTIC purchase! It started right up on first try and cut perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Mark C

customer_reviews.title: Very nice trimmer.
customer_reviews.text: Starts right up. Cuts good. A little heavy, but I'm used to electric. Much nicer than fighting with cords.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: It's great doing yard work!
customer_reviews.text: I liked everything about it. I used it to trim trees.
customer_reviews.author: Daphne

customer_reviews.title: Works well.
customer_reviews.text: Starts right up. Cuts well. 22" is a long cutting bar.
customer_reviews.author: Mark D.

customer_reviews.title: Easy start.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty decent product I will say. Fires up within just a few pulls. A bit heavy, but that is to be expected.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff H.

customer_reviews.title: Cuts and runs great.
customer_reviews.text: Fired right up. Works great. Little weight after a bit forearms feel it. Its what I expected so I am pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend this for trimming shrubbery .
customer_reviews.text: Got a good reach. It starts easily. Plenty of power.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

product_meta.title: Poulan Pro PR2322 22-Inch 23cc 2 Cycle Gas Powered Dual Sided Hedge Trimmer
product_meta.description: Poulan Pro hedge trimmers are easy to use & perfect for trimming tall & low shrubs & hedges all around the yd. PR2322 is equipped with dual-sided, 22" serrated blades, a swivel handle with comfort grip, & incredible 23cc engine power & cutting performance, no hedge is too tough to tackle. Comes with 2 year warranty
feature_bullets: Powerful 23cc 2 cycle full crank engine for maximum cutting performance
Durable dual-action stainless Steel blades cut up to 22" wide and limbs up to 1" in diameter
Rotating handle with comfort grip and advanced anti-vibration for superior comfort, reduced fatigue and maximum cutting control

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars447 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
